text: Stadio Renzo Barbera is a sports stadium in Palermo, Italy. It is mainly used for football matches. It has a seating capacity of 36,349. The stadium was opened on 24 January 1932. It is the home stadium of U.S. Citt√† di Palermo of Serie A and sometimes the Italy national team. Stadio Renzo Barbera hosted three matches of the 1990 FIFA World Cup. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 establishments in Italy Category:Football in Italy Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Palermo Category:Sports buildings in Italy
title: Stadio Renzo Barbera
